articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Rangers, F Brett Howden agree to one-year deal - Reuters
articles.description: The New York Rangers and restricted free agent forward Brett Howden agreed to a one-year deal on Friday.
articles.content: Dec 28, 2019; Toronto, Ontario, CAN; New York Rangers forward Brett Howden (21) celebrates after scoring against Toronto Maple Leafs in the first period at Scotiabank Arena. Mandatory Credit: Dan Ham… [+817 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Antetokounmpo siblings become first trio of brothers to win NBA titles - Reuters
articles.description: Giannis and Thanasis Antetokounmpo became NBA champions on Tuesday with the Milwaukee Bucks, putting them level with younger brother Kostas and making them the first trio of brothers to win a league title.
articles.content: July 21 (Reuters) - Giannis and Thanasis Antetokounmpo became NBA champions on Tuesday with the Milwaukee Bucks, putting them level with younger brother Kostas and making them the first trio of broth… [+1077 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Canada adds 230700 jobs in June, unemployment falls to 7.8% - Reuters
articles.description: Canada added more jobs that expected in June, bringing employment within 1.8% of pre-pandemic levels, though all the gains were in part-time work, Statistics Canada data showed on Friday.
articles.content: People wait in line for resume critique and career assessment sessions at the 2014 Spring National Job Fair and Training Expo in Toronto, April 3, 2014. REUTERS/Aaron HarrisOTTAWA, July 9 (Reuters) -… [+1273 chars]
